articles.title: Class-action suit claims Otter AI secretly records private work conversations - NPR
articles.description: The suit claims the popular service may be recording and processing millions of users' private conversations without consent.

articles.title: Novo Nordisk’s Wegovy Gets US Approval for Liver Disease - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Novo Nordisk A/S’s blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy received Food and Drug Administration approval to treat a serious form of liver disease, beating rival Eli Lilly & Co. to the US market for the increasingly prevalent condition.

articles.title: OpenAI Staffers to Sell $6 Billion in Stock to SoftBank, Other Investors - Bloomberg.com

articles.title: After a freeze, Trump administration reluctantly agrees to fund EV chargers - NPR
articles.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says he doesn't agree with federal subsidies for high-speed EV chargers, but that his department "will respect Congress' will" and release the funds.
